subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The U.C.L.A. freshman Kevin Love adjusted after being frustrated by Maryland’s early physical play, scoring 18 points and grabbing 16 rebounds last night to help second-ranked Bruins overcome a sloppy first half in a 71-59 victory over Maryland in the semifinals of the CBE Classic in Kansas City, Mo.
snippet: The U.C.L.A. freshman Kevin Love adjusted after being frustrated by Maryland’s early physical play, scoring 18 points and grabbing 16 rebounds last night to help second-ranked Bruins overcome a sloppy first half in a 71-59 victory over Maryland...
